adept.data

Class DataSourceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.data.DataSourceFactory

  • public class DataSourceFactory
extends Object
    The Class DataSourceFactory has following responsibilies: (1) maintains list one or more available data sources (2) Provides methods to create and add new data source.
